content.query:
USE NYC_Taxi_Serverless
GO

-- Taxi Zone
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Raw.TaxiZone (
    location_id     SMALLINT
    ,borough        VARCHAR(15)
    ,zone           VARCHAR(50)
    ,service_zone   VARCHAR(15)
)

    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'taxi_zone.csv'
        ,DATA_SOURCE = NYC_Taxi_Raw
        ,FILE_FORMAT = CSV_File_Format
    );
